document.full_text: north korea's iron ruler kim jong-il made a surprise visit to china on friday, south korean media reported, amid a series of confusing reports about who was involved and the purpose of the trip.
document.title: north korean leader makes surprise visit to china-media
lines_and_colors: north korea's iron ruler kim jong-il made a surprise visit to china on friday, south korean media reported, amid a series of confusing reports about who was involved and the purpose of the trip.
